sentences.en: Adolescence is the period of transition between childhood and adulthood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是童年与成年之间的过渡时期.

sentences.en: Adolescence is the process of going from childhood to maturity.
sentences.cn: 青春期是从少年到成年的过渡期.

sentences.en: Adolescence is the transition period between childhood and manhood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是儿童和成人阶段的过渡时期.

sentences.en: As an account of adolescence it could hardly be bettered.
sentences.cn: 作为描写青春期的书，它已几臻完美。

sentences.en: At adolescence, muscles go through a growth spurt.
sentences.cn: 在青春期，肌肉会迅猛发育。

sentences.en: He displayed all the awkwardness of adolescence.
sentences.cn: 他表现出了青春期的各种羞涩不安。

sentences.en: I spent my childhood and adolescence in Florida.
sentences.cn: 我在佛罗里达度过了童年和少年时期.

sentences.en: It is still in the turbulent years of adolescence.
sentences.cn: 它还处在青春活力汹涌澎湃的年代.

sentences.en: It's a retreat into the adolescence they never really had.
sentences.cn: 这是对他们从不曾真正拥有的青春时代的回归.

sentences.en: Some people become very self-conscious in adolescence.
sentences.cn: 有些人在青春期会变得异常害羞。

sentences.en: Some young people suddenly become self-conscious and tongue-tied in early adolescence.
sentences.cn: 一些年青人在青春期早期突然变得害羞结舌。

sentences.en: Some young people who were easy-going and extroverted as children become self-conscious in early adolescence.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻人孩童时脾气随和、性格活泼，刚进入青春期却变得害羞起来。

sentences.en: The film is about the trials and tribulations of adolescence.
sentences.cn: 这部电影讲述了青春期的麻烦和苦恼.

sentences.en: The play is set in the dangerous no-man's land between youth and adolescence.
sentences.cn: 这部戏描写的是青年时期和青春期之间那段危险、暖昧的时光。

sentences.en: There was a lot of unhappiness in my adolescence.
sentences.cn: 年少时我经历过很多不愉快。

words.tran_cn: 进入青春期；如青春期少年般行事

trans.tran_en: the time, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, when a young person is developing into an adult
